author: Successful_Bear276
comment: Congratulations! I didn't get mine from Aerospace Electronics (TP) but for Aerospace Engineering (TP). I heard they only give out only for your first two choices. I have no idea, but from having a hearing from the ground, it seems like they may ask about why this passion, what are your aspirations in the future with this Diploma etc. All the best for the interviews! 😆

author: dtunerz
comment: Simply why do you want to join

author: littlegreyw0lf
comment: ask you why you chose the diploma. To make sure your choice is clear and not because of pressure from parents "just because it offers a good career", "your uncle is in this line and doing well", etc. Make sure it is your own choice and interest.
